## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description     | Type                                                    | Default               |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `align`     | `align`     | Align items     | `"center" \| "end" \| "start" \| "stretch"`             | `undefined`           |
| `direction` | `direction` | Direction       | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`                            | `'vertical'`          |
| `justify`   | `justify`   | Justify content | `"around" \| "between" \| "center" \| "end" \| "start"` | `undefined`           |
| `spacing`   | `spacing`   | Spacing         | `string`                                                | `'var(--el-space-4)'` |
